scripts.install-dependencies: npm install && cd scylla-server && npm install && cd ../angular-client && npm install
scripts.build: cd scylla-server && npm run build && cd ../angular-client && npm run build
scripts.start:production: cd scylla-server && npm run start:production && cd ../angular-client && npm run start:production
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix angular-client" "npm run start --prefix scylla-server"
